review: I downloaded the Calm app to get into a meditation routine and it worked. There are many good series that I would return to, but over time I had listened to most three or four times, and aside from single Daily meditations there was not a lot of new (meditation) content to consume. Having only one narrator/voice as your guide is also limiting when that voice is not one that sits well in your ears (personal preference, I know). Amazing app to get into a meditation habit but not enough to keep me subscribed.

title: Life changing!
review: I know that‚Äôs a dramatic claim for someone who has only had the app for 4 days but truly - I‚Äôm starting not to dread going to bed anymore. I have routinely been falling asleep ok - then am wide awake at 2.30 - lying there worrying about everything under the sun. I have only used the stories so far but they work perfectly! I have had the best 4 nights sleep I can recall since buying the app!

title: Hard to put it down. The sounds and programs just my mind of a worrisome soul.
review:
Calms my very soul. Try the 7 days of anxiety. 

Bedtime stories I enjoy falling off to sleep with a story. Usually,  I can‚Äôt get to sleep now, I wake up hours later and realize I fell to sleep. I listen to another story to clear my mind of everything. It helps me fall !back to sleep which is a big deal I have severe insomnia. 

Cokey Tapper

title: A nightly ritual
review: Calm has become a huge part of our lives. We listen to the sleep stories together as a family almost every night. The stories are perfect for kids and adults. The voices of the narrators are calming and relaxing. I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this app and don‚Äôt know what we‚Äôd do without it. It‚Äôs truly become apart of our nighttime ritual and apart of our family.

title: Disappointing
review: Wow.  Just wow. I came to this app to help with my insomnia since my medication stopped helping.  You have to buy everything.  I found two free stories and that was it. They try so hard to make you buy premium but I can‚Äôt spare the money for it. There isn‚Äôt a free section for free stories and even when you search free nothing free comes up.  It‚Äôs very annoying and if there were some that could be added it would be amazing. I would recommend it to plenty but it‚Äôs only for the crowd who wants to spend money on something like this.

title: Calm delivers - peace
review: This app has helped more in the past year than years of therapy ever did ‚Äî COVID-19 pandemic (and working from home) notwithstanding. I started with relaxing music, then tried other items offered on the app. I took up a simple 10-minute meditation daily and have noticed I‚Äôm so much more at peace internally. I could never have imagined it would make such a difference. Thank you, Calm!

title: Peaceful
review:
Between chronic neck pain and just plain restlessness, I‚Äôm pretty used to not sleeping that great. With Calm, I am sleeping much sounder.  Just put on a soundscape and I instantly feel calmer. 
I also struggle with my mind racing when I‚Äôm trying to fall asleep. I started listening to meditations before my sound scape... it‚Äôs been helping my mind calm down! Love this app! 
I look forward to going to sleep so I can relax and be peaceful!

title: Like most apps
review:
Hello Christi from Calm. I rarely if ever buy an app. The reason...I don‚Äôt trust anyone who advertises a discount but makes you click a link to find out how much the price is. First it‚Äôs a free app, then ah, it‚Äôs only free for a week. If you don‚Äôt sign up then you get the email that tells you OMG can you believe this...there is a discount of 50%...not of what...just 50%. If you click on the link to see the price I bet it‚Äôs the full price but how would anyone know what that was. Reject the gift then there is another gift, how about 13 months instead of 12. 

Really...do you think??? Bet you sleep good at night counting the greens,

title: My safe space
review: I‚Äôve been actively using this app for two years now. This got me through some of the most traumatic situations in my life. I cannot appreciate this app enough. Everything I need for my severe anxiety, sadness, and stressful situations. This app is my go to when I am in a bad spot. Even when I‚Äôm happy this app just teaches me how to live a better life. Can‚Äôt imagine what life was like before this app.

title: Amazing!
review: Calm has gotten me to sleep in at least 5 minutes each night, I have a lot of anxiety about things and the stories are so peaceful!! There‚Äôs a different story for everyone and calm has it all, from sounds of rain to 45 minute stories! This is an amazing app(in my opinion) and there variety is amazing!! I love this app and would highly recommend it to everyone. :)

title: It‚Äôs good!
review: It‚Äôs good! But there nothing you can do without paying 70 dollars a year and  unlocking that. So every things locked unless you pay for it. I only found,like, two things that are not locked. But i might buy the unlocking thing or delete it. But it seems like a amazing app! It helps with lots of stress. So if your up to paying 70 dollars a year, you can get the best out of it!!!!

title: Hard to trust - too much political content
review: I‚Äôve used the Calm paid version for two years. I‚Äôve noticed in the past year that the app has become political.  If I‚Äôm going to allow someone to guide my subconscious mind, I need to feel safe with the meditations.  More often this past year the meditations start by reminding people how stressful the world is or how divisive politics are. I have deleted the app because I don‚Äôt like having to anticipate what stressful news topic will be brought up next.  Calm should be a haven and safe space, not a reminder of all the chaos.

title: I use this app every night!
review: I love this app! I use it every single night to help fall asleep. If I need to wind down I usually listen to the deep sleep with the soothing voice of ms. Tamara. I love to listen to the thunderstorm soundscape. It is my absolute favorite. My only suggestion is to have more thunder in the thunderstorm. This is more like rain with an occasional clap of thunder. I am so blessed that my insurance company covers the cost of the app.

title: Just trying to steal your money
review: Hello I am currently nine years old right now and this is just a waste of time and I do not like it for starters everything wants you to buy anything and everything I hate it it‚Äôs a waste of time and I would not like to ask my mom for all of this crap but on the bright side it did kind of help me understand meditation more but none of my anxiety has been released at all so please take this in and help me out here by stopping all this money I don‚Äôt wanna give you any of my money but I‚Äôm just mad at this app I am mad at whoever made this

title: One Hypnotist for majority of Sleep ones
review: I use Guided Meditations almost exclusively for sleep. All but a few of Calm‚Äôs offerings of sleep meditations are with one hypnotist, whose voice is grating to me. It may as well be nails on a chalkboard when I hear her voice. I had the premium subscription but will be canceling it. After 2 years of it, I hoped they would expand their offerings but it hasn‚Äôt happened and doesn‚Äôt look like they‚Äôre changing that anytime soon. Switched over to the Slumber app instead and much happier with that one. So far, they add guided meditations weekly.

title: Best App
review: Literally has in my opinion saved me!Even though this sounds ridiculous I overdosed on marijuana on April 2020 and since then I have found meditation because what happened was it threw me into panic and anxiety attacks. And before I had a diagnosis from a doctor I found meditation and have been doing it since and it has saved my life I‚Äôve been a blessing in every sense of the word

title: Research before purchasing!
review: I really wish I had done more research on all the meditation apps before I purchased Calm. The majority of the guided meditations are from Tamara, the ‚ÄúHead of Mindfulness at Calm.‚Äù I personally do not find her voice soothing, and have had difficulty finding other meditations on the app that are not guided by her. It is such a well known platform, I would expect it to be more expansive, and have more teachers available on it. I have found other platforms way better. Very disappointed in the app overall

title: App is worth the paid version
review: I found more and more from Calm each year I‚Äôve used it.  Had it for 2 years now.  Last 2 years my work has been stressful with travel and family.  The daily managing of stress alone has helped mind, plus body.  Body in so much of assisting in quality of sleep, heartburn, etc,...  Hidden anxiety taking a toll on the physical self.

title: I pay for crashes??
review: I pay for this app and it‚Äôs expensive. I try to use it all the time but the last two updates have been absolutely horrific. It crashes on me multiple times a night so I just gave up and went to another site. Now after this latest update it won‚Äôt even open past the ‚Äútake a deep breath‚Äù screen üò°üò°üò°  I‚Äôm REALLY dissatisfied with how glitchy and slow it is. I pay a lot of money for this app but if they don‚Äôt fix the crashing issues I‚Äôm canceling. It‚Äôs appalling that my 80+ dollars app won‚Äôt work. üò°üò°üò°üò°

title: Way, way , way tooo short stories
review:
The voices are calming, very soothing but ONLY around 30 mins long. You have to KEEP coming out of your rest to look for a new story. 
  I find after 2 or 3 times doing this, I am frustrated and now fully awake turning to something else to put me to sleep. Now I also have the problem dealing with the anger of not getting TO SLEEP.
 Make the stories a minimum of an hour please.

title: Lifesaver
review: This app was a lifesaver for me. As a registered nurse working on a Covid unit I was pretty much at the end of my rope. I used Calm all day every day!!! I used it to get me through my day and to help me sleep. It was worth every penny. I had never been much for meditation, but just putting the screen on the ocean with soothing sounds while I charted helped me immensely. I could go on and on, highly recommend this app.

title: Tamara Levitt is What‚Äôs Wrong With The World
review: If you‚Äôre looking for a patronizing wu-wu ramble to make you question meditation all together, you‚Äôve come to the right place. Inane fast-food wisdom combined with the effected, breathy voice of the narrator, Tamara, is sure to cause the listener to be less calm and more annoyed than when they started. A session on this app feels less like meditation than it does a solo-podcast with an air headed host looking to sell her line of healing crystals.  The app would be improved by replacing Tamara with literally anyone that doesn‚Äôt sound like they‚Äôre trying to push salvia on elementary school kids.

title: Meditation
review:
I‚Äôve had this wonderful app for over a year. I have practice yoga most of my life with meditation at different times of my life but more regularly now. 

My only thought regarding Calm is sometimes I wish the meditations were a little longer.... the silence and the breathing. Of course this is something I do on my own but I enjoy the Calm guided meditations with words of wisdom! 
Thank you!

title: I feel i can trust LeBron James
review:
Bringing up two sons who idolize any sport with a ball in it I would also need to learn the super stars they would follow mentally as well as physically.  LeBron James can also help this 71 year old caucasian woman who would like to channel her
energy in a more positive way.  it‚Äôs difficult to get older and not have those two boys to chase all over God green earth.  Thank you for your words.

title: Great new additions!
review: With the addition of the amazing Jeff Warren, on the daily trip I am now back to listening to my calm app every night!When I started listening to the calm app I did his 30 days of meditation along with several sleep teachings and meditations, and have made great strides in my ability to relax, focus, sleep better. I am a therapist who highly recommends this app to all my clients.

title: Great App
review: This app helped me through a true hard time worth the money in my opinion, the music is great sleep stories, self help readings by all different people help lift moods and get you thinking on a new perspective. There are also children options with stories music and meditation, I used the sleep stories with my kids a few times and it definitely did the trick.

title: Love this app
review: My meditation practice needs improvement & so working with CALM is very helpful.  Like the self check-in, the tracker I can use to ‚Äúplan‚Äù and assess my mediation practice and the content of the 10-12 minute sessions.  I really miss going to live yoga classes during COVID & listening to a real person guide through mediation via CALM in the comfort of my own home is great.  Thank you for creating these sessions!

title: Life Changing
review: I use the daily meditation to start my day. It‚Äôs made a huge difference in my mental well-being. Tamara has a soothing voice - makes it easy to listen. My kids and I love the sleep stories - we listen to one almost every night. I have also used the meditations related to calming anxiety - they‚Äôve been especially helpful during this pandemic.

title: Absolutely perfect for stressful moments
review: I used to have a lot of trouble sleeping and calming my thoughts during stressful moments. Now Calm is my GO TO the second I‚Äôm feeling anxious or in need of some calming comforting breaths. They have an incredible selection of content and I‚Äôm particularly a fan of their bedtime stories :) their bedtime stories make you feel like a kid again but in the most adult way possible‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Constantly needs to be reinstalled
review: My iPhone screen will shut off and normally music will still play but with this app, nope. It will for two days then I have to reinstall it to get it to work again. I googled it and this is a common problem with no fix other than reinstalling the app. The developers have some serious kinks to work out. This is a fabulous app and to have it work so poorly is sad considering my insurance is providing this to me for anxiety. Get it together calm!

title: Daily Mindfulness
review:
I‚Äôm enjoying the app so far. I‚Äôve tried the free trials and trying to justify the price tag of daily use. 

As I dig deeper into the app, I am finding it more useful and finding more ways to be present and experience mindfulness. 

I‚Äôm giving it four stars because I see where it could use more content, however, that could change over time. I‚Äôm very pleased with the content that I have explored so far.

title: Total rip off
review:
I went to the website and tried to sign up for a basic membership or trial but the site literally will not let you 
It skips over basic membership and charges you $65 for a year to try it and then  says it won‚Äôt refund Any of your money and that you have to contact apple support and beg them for a refund and maybe apple will refund and Maybe not 

The same two ppl narrate pretty much everything I tried on the app and the woman Tamara‚Äôs voice is extremely annoying 
I can‚Äôt meditate to that 
I tried to get a refund and there‚Äôs no way to contact anyone so think twice before you spend 65 dollars to try something because YOU CAN NOT GET REFUND 
I will be calling credit card company tomorrow to do a charge back 
I used the app for about 30 minutes so I think a month charge would be fair but nope it‚Äôs $65 . It‚Äôs a scam to force you into a year membership and that tells ne the company is dishonest

title: Helps with sleep and stress
review: I love this app. The only thing to improve is that I use it with my headphones and all my text notifications are read by Siri while I‚Äôm meditating. I wish this app had the ability to block notifications while in use because some people like to send five texts in a row and keep pestering until they get a reply.

title: No but no
review: When I first saw an ad on calm saying that it could help me fall asleep I said I‚Äôll check it out when I got onto the app I saw that I had to pay for some thing and I was like OK I‚Äôm not gonna pay for it when I got to fully into the app all of the things were locked and only miniature items were not and that was very stressful now I have to pay $70 for me to unlock all of the things on the app and makes no sense and then you only gave us 7 days  to have it free I give a bad review because that is entirely messed up.

title: Changed My Life
review: I saw a Calm advertisement on TV at the beginning of the pandemic. I‚Äôd been feeling the need to center myself in general so it appealed to me. Little did I know how much it would affect my life in such a powerful way physically (lower blood pressure), mentally and spiritually! This app offers so much. I recommend it to anyone who is willing to sit with themselves and grow. Tamara Levitt is awesome!! I am grateful that I discovered Calm!üíê

title: Relaxation
review:
I am always feeling stressed and have lots of anxiety but when I come on to this app it just releases it and put it in a jar and ship far away forever and that feeling is just so inspiring and amazing so I want to bless all of you and I want to be able to wish that this app will help you just like it is helping me. I hope you have a wonderful day  

God bless youüôèüòä

title: Just a Few Moments of Each Day
review:
To be able to stop and see what I have done throughout the day, and stop. Where did I start, where am I, and where am I headed?

It really is rather simple, and can bring much joy to the day. So rather than letting myself become tense, angry, or unhappy; just let me take a few moments of the day, and rebalance the rest of today.

title: Calm
review: Just on site for a few hours..the most calming videos, pictures, beautiful scenery, fascinating content throughout. Insightful to the extreme . Never seen such amazing clarity flying above clouds, incredible waterfalls, waves, storms, lakes, beautiful raindrops gently falling on reacting leaves, enough already. I‚Äôve almost reached transcendence , just want to spread the wisdom and love to family and trusted friends. Enjoy, best investment I‚Äôve ever made.

title: Want $$ to try it
review: I wanted to try it but I can‚Äôt  because no matter what I try to listen to in any category I get a message to try it free for 7 days BUT I have to submit my credit card to even try it.  It‚Äôs very expensive at $70 a year for a student or a senior on a fixed income.  I‚Äôm not willing to give my credit card and get stuck with an auto bill. If they really were willing to try a free trial they would offer free access and at end of 7 days let person know they have to purchase to continue to use the app. Developer won‚Äôt even do monthly fee just a year.

title: Essential
review: I don‚Äôt write reviews but I needed to for this. Tamara and the rest of the readers they have on here are just phenomenal. They‚Äôve truly saved me during the pandemic and have helped make me a better, more aware individual. The Daily Calm is an essential daily ritual and the payoff for those few minutes is invaluable. Couldn‚Äôt recommend this with any more enthusiasm.

title: Love it but Tamara‚Äôs voice  has changed and has adopted a weird accent now
review: I don‚Äôt know if Tamara changed her audio equipment, but her voice is more tinny and burgeoning on vocal fry.  Tamara had a very relaxing, velvety smooth voice when the app started.  I don‚Äôt like to be critical and say this only to be constructive...we know the British accent sounds cool and all, but please also stop the newly acquired weird accent. It is distracting and you don‚Äôt need to do it. Be yourself.

title: You have to pay to use the app
review: I downloaded this app to help me sleep and it didn‚Äôt help at all because you are aloud to listen to one story without the premium and with the premium you have some of them it is so stupid that calm has done this don‚Äôt download this app!!!!!! I only gave it five stars so then you would be able to see this comment! DON‚ÄôT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT‚ÄôS A RIPOFF

title: Hard to gift
review: I purchased a gift subscription for a family member. It has been a nightmare to then actually be able to gift it to her! The‚Äù Help and Support ‚Äú tab steps as how to do this isn‚Äôt what actually happened. And trying to find an actual phone number to speak to someone with Calm on the app is impossible. Not happy.

title: More 40+min stories & poems please
review: I love this app! It‚Äôs such a game changer. My favorite sleep story is the one with Harry Styles. I love the music and poem style story - also it‚Äôs pretty long (40+ min) which is great. I really would like to see more poems like this one on the app. There‚Äôs something soothing about drifting off to sleep with the rhythm of the rhyming. Hopefully Calm can keep growing and expanding their story styles/genres.

title: Can an app be life changing?
review: The answer is yes. I swear this app is 80% responsible for my ability to function during this pandemic. I love the sleep stories, soundscapes, and music to work to. The pink noise is like a massage for your brain. 10/10 recommend. I will definitely continue paying for this app once my year of a free trial through Kaiser Permanente has been completed.

title: Good but not great.
review: I used to work for a wellness app and I‚Äôve been searching for another app to replace it with. I tried Calm in hopes it would meet my needs but it‚Äôs not a great fit. Mainly because I want to listen to programs while I‚Äôm multitasking. I want to listen in the car, or on a walk, or while I‚Äôm working but every program asks you to close your eyes and clear your mind which is probably great for a lot of people but it isn‚Äôt what I need. I want to use my time to get self-care while I‚Äôm doing some other often mundane task.

title: Takes all the stress out of meditating
review: Just what I needed to start making daily habits of the healthy practices I‚Äôd been dabbling in. It‚Äôs beautiful, soothing and inviting. Gives me gentle prompts to meditate and reflect. Suggests meditations so I don‚Äôt have to go scrolling through a menu or remember to set things up in advance. It provides the structure and encouragement I needed to make a daily habit of meditation.

title: Paid subscription not eligible for Family Sharing
review: I just subscribed today and was surprised to see that they‚Äôve opted out of making their subscription eligible for Family Sharing.  In their FAQ they give the reason for this as they ‚Äúare still working to develop the best experience possible for families who share Calm with each other.‚Äù  Family Sharing works pretty well, Calm.  Just go with that.  There‚Äôs no way we‚Äôre purchasing multiple $70 annual subscriptions, so I may not commit after my free trial is up.

title: Playing sounds when app is closed
review: I‚Äôve had this app for a few years and I like the variety of sounds and the fact that they turn off after a few hours, which is why I would give in 4 starts. Lately it‚Äôs been going off in the middle of the day or over night randomly. The app is closed and my phone will say I‚Äôm playing nothing, super weird.

title: More options
review: I really wish there was more options for people using calm that do not have the subscription, because most of my favorites are locked. Sometimes when I want to listen to a body scan or a meditation session, it‚Äôs locked and I can‚Äôt enjoy the things I like about the app. Nevertheless this app is truly a wonderful release after a long day of school or work.

title: Total fraudulent trial program: once you click yes they bill you for a year and you cannot get out!
review: I found the site did not provide enough substance for the cost; so then I tried to cancel before the trial date ended; The site made it absolutely impossible to cancel and then immediately charged me a FULL year subscription without any notice. I think this is the most fraudulent set up and con job imaginable. Lure people in, make it impossible to stop and then bill them for a year of service with absolutely no way to get out of their fraudulent contract. Such a scam.

title: Love this app!
review: I use the CALM app for sleep stories at night and daily morning meditation. I also love the focus music options during work periods. Just recently I lost a colleague and the grief stories were so helpful. I have also enjoyed the daily reflections snd quotes. In a fit of anxiety , the emergency breaths are an indispensable resource. I don‚Äôt know what I would do without the CALM app!

title: Pretty good
review:
I mostly use Calm for the Sleep Stories.  They really do help with my sleep.  I don‚Äôt like the daily Calm, for some reason I find the narrators voice really irritating   I‚Äôve tried over and over and can‚Äôt stand her voice and delivery (Tamara) 
I have listened to some of the visitor meditations and like them better. 
I would like more new sleep stories.  I really like the ones about travel.  Eric Braa is my favorite his voice is soothing.  
I‚Äôd like to hear more chapters of Treasure Island!  
Lynne W

title: Calm helps
review:
I‚Äôm finding artists and collections of sounds that surpass classical music when the spirit needs rest. The visuals are done well for an app. In one app I find relaxing instrumentals with and without nature‚Äôs music, meditations and peace. I am enjoying your selections.
 
    Artists that I am familiar with are putting music on Calm that reveal how much they resonate with the new age. Thanks for all your efforts.

title: Nice App
review: I like this app a lot. It has nice features such as being able to set reminders for different things (daily check-ins). The worst part about this app is that almost all of the really cool features and options you must ‚Äúunlock‚Äù by paying for a subscription. I do not pay for it, and therefore have limited access to what I can actually do on the app. I‚Äôd much rather the app just have a one-time-fee to access all parts of the app.

title: I tried.
review: This was the 3rd app I downloaded for relieving stress and I was crossing my fingers. But sadly, everything you have to buy. Most of the things are locked.üîí I really wished this wasn‚Äôt another app that gauges you for money, I was very disappointed. It looked like a very useful app. I just don‚Äôt wanna pay more money for a stress reliever app. I still gave it four stars, but I won‚Äôt continue to use this app. üòï

title: Need a Sleep Stories app!
review: I only use Calm for the sleep stories for which I would give almost 5 stars. I‚Äôve tried the meditation and some of the other things, but find them grating and triggering. I don‚Äôt care for the main woman‚Äôs voice all over the app, but love the diversity of the stories voices. I have some favorites who have deep, soothing voices. The price is a bit steep for just stories that are only updated maybe twice a month, so I‚Äôd love a Sleep Stories only app.

title: Love this app
review: Love this app, it has helped me very very much.  The only thing I would like to see different is the ability to have unlimited favorites.  When I keep adding favorites it knocks some of them out of my list cause there is a limited number you can use.  Other than that, I could not be without this app.  Love it!!!

title: Sleep stories
review: I love love love calm. It helps me sleep every night and I love all of the guided meditations. I would like to suggest being able to queue up sleep stories, and sort by length. It takes me a while to settle in, and sometimes I need to put on a second sleep story, but the light from my phone/ interaction with the app takes me out of my sleepiness.

title: Delightful variety of resources
review: Daily Calm provides many teachers and many modes of working one‚Äôs awareness.  It would be impossible to spend enough time to explore it all and still do one‚Äôs regular life! The graphics and photos are gorgeous and the music also.  I‚Äôm especially grateful for the basics taught by Jeff Warren which got me to set a habit and stay curious.

title: No more free content
review: I used this app for free when my baby was born to play lullabies, help with post partum insomnia and keep our sanity. I used to listen to one of the tracks called Milky Way- it was my favorite. These were free and required no trial or purchase. It‚Äôs all I wanted and guess what, those are LOCKED now. Very disappointed. Some people have a budget and can‚Äôt afford the full version but now there is nothing left at all to use -even for free- even things that were once free within the app. Will be uninstalling and hoping Bored Panda will be enough for me and the baby to sleep.

title: An excellent introduction & maintenance tool
review:
Instead of reading a lengthy book to learn how to meditate, Calm lets you learn in small chunks, AS you practice.

Consistent practice is the key to getting the benefits of mindfulness meditation. Calm helps you stay on track with that as well.

I use it and I‚Äôve bought lifetime subs for myself and my daughter. Cant give higher praise than that.

title: App is overwhelming
review:
Calm is a very overwhelming app. For a place that one is supposed to go to for relaxing, it has caused me anxiety on several occasions because I'm not sure where to go within the app. There are too many things going on and too many categories.
The content is the best in the world but there is so much to sift through before picking something.
I really wish the app gets re organized into simpler categories for someone to easily navigate and find what they need.

title: Hate the update
review: I have listened to 336 hours on the Calm app. I absolutely love it. But the newest update is horrible! It‚Äôs hard to find my favorites, and when I do.... it shows maybe 5. The new layout just feels like chaos and I much preferred the last one. It‚Äôs hard to search through now and I barely open my app anymore. I used to use it every single night but I‚Äôm just THAT annoyed with the stinking layout. Not sure if I‚Äôll renew my subscription

title: Good content, poor app
review: I love Calm and the content they offer is great, but the app needs an overhaul. It launches and runs slowly, and it drains my phone and iPad batteries quickly while it‚Äôs open. Navigation could use some work too. The competing apps do not suffer these issues. I have resorted to using Calm from the web browser. It‚Äôs a better experience. I have raised my concerns about app performance to customer service, and they didn‚Äôt seem to care.

title: Frequent issues. These need to be fixed!
review:
Your app is not working. It‚Äôs been frozen like this all morning. 

It‚Äôs stuck on the opening page that says, ‚ÄúTake a deep breath‚Äù. Ok. And...?

Frustrating.

Calm seems to be having a lot of issues. It‚Äôs crashed quite a bit from time to time. It‚Äôs slow to load... The unreliability doesn‚Äôt only mean it‚Äôs not usable when I need it, it‚Äôs also aggravating, esp. after repeated failed attempts to use the app. 

Doesn‚Äôt help that Calm doesn‚Äôt make it easy to reach out for help or even to provide feedback. 

The irony: I‚Äôm finding myself annoyed when I‚Äôm looking to the app to get to a place of calm & relaxation. 

This is not what Premium members signed up to pay for.  Are you even aware of the problem? Are you fixing it?

title: Great able / please fix ableist context
review: I do really love this app. Just wanted to point out that in your 7 days of gratitude meditation there is a part about being grateful for your eye sight because not everyone has it. Please be aware that blind folks are able to access/use this app and it‚Äôs inappropriate ableist language. Maybe update the language in that one. Otherwise fantastic and calming, grounding app.

title: Suggestion
review: I really love the app. One thing I wish could change is the ‚Äútime played out of app‚Äù. It goes from nothing (0 minutes) to 15 minutes. I wish there was a 5 minute option. It‚Äôs like right when the meditation is done boom you‚Äôre done. Kind of jarring. But the 15 minutes is just to long for those using this before getting ready for work.

title: Great content but lacking basic features
review: Calm‚Äôs sleep stories has been wonderful for helping me sleep but the app is missing really basic features like playlists or search. Would love the ability to play a playlist of multiple in a row. Often I wake up when one ends but then when I start another, my husband wakes up. There should also be a way to search for stories by the same person.

title: Amazing caring professionals
review:
Everyone that teaches on calm are all helpful and amazing. I have no regrets with buying this app, this has helped me through tons of life issues that has built up.  
I want to thank Jeff Warren in particular for helping with life situations he is by far one of my favorites on calm. 

Thankyou calm for helping all of us get through hard times.

title: Charge without notice
review: Be very careful that they would try to sneakily charge your subscription fee without any notice. No email reminder of upcoming subscription renewal, and very hard to find where to cancel the subscription. And of course, couldn‚Äôt find anywhere to submit the request for a refund. I will work with the credit company to get my money back but just want to leave a comment to warn other users, they are definitely trying hard to not make you aware of your upcoming payment. Horrible customer service.

title: Be aware they renew subscription without notice until it‚Äôs done
review: Received free year and didn‚Äôt realize they would automatically renew.  Tried it a couple of times but it added nothing to my meditation practice so deleted app.  Received notice today that the subscription renewed with no notice. You are expected to track it.  Unsubscribed after the fact and there is no way to get my money back as far as I can tell. disgusted.  Stuck with a subscription I won‚Äôt use and haven‚Äôt used for almost the entire year.  Sleazy.

title: Awesome, Amazing, And Wonderful! üåπ‚ú®üòä
review:
I fall asleep to this all the time! I love this app! I‚Äôd give it a 5 star rating! Everyone is says ‚ÄúI need new voices!‚Äù But the voices are fine! I think there pretty and calming. And my favorite voice is Tamara Levitt. Her voice is just so soothing üòå And over all I don‚Äôt think there should be anything to fix. This is an amazing app! You guys should get it! ‚ù§Ô∏è
‚ò∫Ô∏è
üôè

title: What is going on
review: I have loved this app and use it daily for several years and have given it as gifts... Now when I try to get in I am able to login and then I get this advertising business and wanting me to sign up again ...what is going on I wanted to go to bed and listen to a sleep story this is ridiculous ????

title: Broken with update please fix
review:
Stuck at take a deep breath screen. Same as everyone else. 

Not sure why they‚Äôre handling this individually and having people contact support as this is a universal problem with the latest update. 

As a premium subscriber for over 4 years now (probably longer) I‚Äôd appreciate a dev response to everyone on steps their taking (or at least an ACKNOWLEDGEMENT the problem exists?!) calm is usually very good about issues that have come up in the past so I‚Äôm a little surprised at the lackluster or completely lacking response.
developerResponse: {'id': 21407270, 'body': 'So sorry for the trouble you\'ve experienced! Please try leaving the app open on the loading screen, as this should allow the app to fully load. Upon subsequent app launches, the app should then load normally without any delay on the "take a deep breath" screen. If you are experiencing issues on an older version of the iOS app, please update to the latest version, then follow the steps above if you experience any loading issues.', 'modified': '2021-03-02T20:36:27Z'}

title: Good, But some suggestions
review: I think this app is a nice way to get a lot of stuff off your mind, but i am not old enough to spend money on premium, so almost EVERYTHING cost‚Äôs money when it really should not, i get that you need to make money, and i understand, But mabye for premium just make less things cost money, or mabye get rid of it all together? Because i have listened to almost every sound and story on here, and there is a lot more.

title: False advertisement
review: Literally have to pay to listen to anything other than like 4 stories per section. Why advertise that it‚Äôs free if it‚Äôs literally an app where you have to pay (according to a paying customer of yours) 5 dollars a month if you‚Äôre gonna make people pay that much a month why not just make the whole app accessible with a purchase of just 5 dollars I‚Äôd rather this be a free app with ads on the sidelines than an app where you have to be constantly paying to use it when it‚Äôs advertised as free. Wish I could give it 0 stars

title: It save my live
review:
Seems like a full exaggeration of my part. Have been suffering of anxiety from some time ago. 

Yes, I tried meditate from myself but it was close of the guidance and direction and training this app gave to me. Tamara Levitt and Jeff Warren have been part of my wake up morning every day since October 2020. Time for Meditation It is a must in every one life.

title: Diverse voices to compliment diverse images please
review: So often in this day and age companies practice D&I by going no further than adding images of diversity to their website, app.   But when I open their content diverse voices absent. So I move on and rarely use the Calm app that I have free for one year from Kaiser because the voices all sound the same and I get the impression that the diverse voices are not being hired. Mostly white male or female. Nothing wrong but I want to have a choice to hear voices that is a reflect my culture, my needs, my soul.

title: Could be a 5 star app, except for....
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for almost 2 years. I enjoy the daily meditations except for the narrator Tamara Levitt. Her tone is condescending and patronizing, plus she can‚Äôt stop talking. She‚Äôs a huge distraction. She does a good job of writing the meditations, but Calm needs to find other mediation leaders. Come on Calm give us a choice for daily meditation.

title: Calm is insipid and stresses me out
review: I have no idea how I got cornered into buying an entire year‚Äôs subscription for an app I don‚Äôt want or use. The so-called music is worse than being in an elevator or on hold with a customer service line - insipid and soulless are the words that come to mind and I am personally surprised that some of the musicians I admire actually put their names on here. Of course it‚Äôs impossible to cancel if you purchased via iTunes etc. and now I learn that it would have been free as a Kaiser member - would have been nice if they asked that at the very beginning!

title: No customer service. Unhappy with purchase
review: I started using this app when it first came out. I thought I‚Äôd try out the subscription and accidentally purchased the lifetime version (good til 3017!?) for a womping $300+ one-time payment! I was intending on paying like $2-3 MAX. I contacted the app and trying fixing the issue and they never responded. Mind you, the app is mediocre at best. The paid for app isn‚Äôt really any better than the free version. I‚Äôve only used it a handful of times since 2017...but I‚Äôm stuck apparently. For forever. I feel the opposite of calm using it now.

title: Peaceful mind, calm body
review:
The Calm App has helped me deal with anxiety. I  enjoy all the different applications. Easy to use and very key for people who have never meditated. I also love the sleep stories for those nights when you need some help falling asleep. I use it everyday at least 3 or 4 times. It is essential to my well being.
MarTorres

title: So helpful!
review: Calm app- has been along this journey of mines when it comes to anxiety, stresses of life, depression etc. I‚Äôm still learning but with the help of meditation and just truly existing in the present and not being so hard on myself (which I can be) this app has been so helpful! Thankful to have come across this app when I did ü¶ã

title: Great app except for one thing
review:
Calm is a great app it got me asleep in seconds but everything is premium like the free stuff theirs only one episode of the whole thing that is free. I want to save money but it‚Äôs kinda ridiculous that I only get one episode out of like 40 episodes. But I love the app I just wish it wasn‚Äôt all premium. 

Thanks 
By Jake

title: App keeps crashing
review:
While I love the content the app crashes when I am listening to sleep stories. Had to restart stories 4 times last night. Kinda defeats the purpose don‚Äôt you think? I went from five stars to three because of this problem. I cannot find a way to communicate with you other than a review. 

Here‚Äôs hoping you read these reviews and fix the problem soon.

Thank you

title: Love this app but could be better
review:
I absolutely love this app but there are some improvements that could be made. 

1. Why can‚Äôt you favorite a sleep story or meditation without playing it first??
2. Why can‚Äôt you cue up sleep stories? On Apple Music you have the option to select ‚Äúplay next‚Äù on songs, it would be nice if sleep stories had something similar..

title: The daily calm meditations
review: Everyday they have a different topic for guided meditation that always ties into something that we all struggle with on life. The guided meditations are helpful. They also have some for children and a variety of other topics. I haven‚Äôt delved into them all but this is a pretty good app for all the hype it was given during the pandemic by Kaiser staff.

title: Calm
review: When I said in silence and do my breathing exercise I feel better mobility to talk and speak a whole sentence become better and clear my mind is better my reflexes silence played a big part in my life this morning today is the first day that I‚Äôve taken out walking I walk two blocks and back home

title: This helps me fall asleep every night!
review: I pretty much have a streak of listening to the same sleep story every night but let‚Äôs ignore that fact and I have to say, this app is amazing, I wake up with good thoughts in my head and a great dream last night because of the things your stories make me think about! Thx so much!!!

title: Ok igüôÉüôÉ
review:
So I love this app, but there is something that needs to change. First of all I would like to point out that the per year amount is way to expensive (well to me). Also that with everything you can do, you must have premium. Which is unfair. I would like if there is more options then just your scene with the sounds...üôÉ

But overall it‚Äôs a good app.

title: New Prospective
review: After a serious issue with my back and legs and a few anxiety and panic attacks along with the worry I decided to get into meditation and stick with it this time. I have done that and the results have been exhilarating. I look forward to taking the time for myself and the guidance from CALM has been great.

title: Free version to try... good luck finding anything free..
review: I was trying this out for my Psychiatrist.  I love the options of sounds/backgrounds on your main page.  Basically everything I clicked after that required a subscription so...  I‚Äôm going to have to report back to not recommend.  We‚Äôre Cancer patients. Since everything I click on to try out requires signing up a credit card.  We out.  If in the future you offer anything on the free app I‚Äôd be happy to review again but as of now this is a failure and waste of time

title: 5.12.1 made calm disappear!
review: Calm you are my five star sleep routine for myself and my whole family. However, when I updated to this version all I get is a blue screen telling me to take a deep breath. Yeah, not fixing the bugs. Luckily my husband hasn‚Äôt updated his app so we can still access for now. Please fix!

title: Now becoming political. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüò•
review:
I have so enjoyed the meditations but now they are becoming political.  I just want to meditate, be present in the moment, listen to peaceful sounds, focus on positive, encouraging words and try to sleep or refresh. 

We all have our needs for identity and our battles to fight but can‚Äôt we just be human beings who need to rest or regroup for a few minutes without feeling even meditations are fomenting causes and agendas? Disappointing!

title: Great! Just a few suggestions.
review: I really enjoy the app. I think something that should be changed is, please add some free things. I understand that there aren‚Äôt many (or no) ads so you have to pay, but I think there should be a few free things in each category (meditation,music, etc.) but please leave the check ins for freeüòÖ. Other than that, it‚Äôs a great app!! ü§çü§çü§ç

title: Love calm
review: My mom sometimes puts on a calm story for me and my brother. That is where I first heard of calm. This app helps me calm down and release stress or anger. I love Bella‚Äôs Bedtime Blanket 2. It is my favorite because she time travels to go meet the Write brothers and I think that is SO COOL! Also, there are no adds which I absolutely LOVE ‚ù§Ô∏è! This app is for people between 2-98(all ages). This is why I love calm.

title: Love it but the rain won‚Äôt stop
review: Love this app, but weird new glitch is occurring where even if I don‚Äôt have the app open, the intro rain noises will suddenly start playing out of no where. It‚Äôs happened a number of times now and I can‚Äôt get it to stop unless I open up the app and force close it. This has been happening for a week now and restarting my phone does not make a difference. Super frustrating!

title: The Gift of Calm
review:
Calm has changed my life every single day.  If I say it‚Äôs made the world better. . . that is not true. It‚Äôs made me better. I see more. I feel accepting of me and then I feel acceptance of all those around me. I am the recipient of wonder and peace. . . how can I not share with those I meet? With those I care about ?
With those I love?

title: But the premium
review: This is a decent sleep app. It has the sleep sounds and stories and everything. However, even though it‚Äôs designed to relive stress and anxiety, it has now become the source of my annoyance and disappointment. Whenever I get ready to go to sleep and click on some sleep music, I end up with Calm premium which is very stressful. I ended up downloading a different app with much lower prices and the same quality as this one. Please, for your claim to releasing stress, either take away premium altogether or lower the prices.

title: Fantastic app
review: I hate spending so much time looking for a podcast that‚Äôs interesting but not so riveting that I‚Äôll stay awake all night. This app is filled with gentle voices telling me stories I don‚Äôt care about, but soft and easy to listen to. The meditations are fine but the sleep stories are the real gems. Some of the music mixes are great too.

title: Thank you for supporting tennis player Naomi Osaka.
review:
I want to express my reaction to news that your company is supporting tennis player Naomi Osaka. I was surprised and delighted. I was reminded that your app was a tool for healing. Ironically, I put it to little use during The Pandemic. I was actually too busy ‚Äî- surviving. Now, I am resuming my practices. They are, I am reminded, part of my survival tool kit.

D

title: Changed my life for the better!
review: I started using calm at the beginning of the pandemic and it really helped me to cope. Then I discovered the master classes and the spark and the breathing exercises and it helped me to thrive. I recommend it to anyone many people whether to help them through difficulty or to support them as they evolve.

title: Amazing app but make more of it free
review: I love this app and it helped me get rid of a lot of my stress. But I could only use it for a couple of days because of the fact that so much of it u need to pay for. I would pay for it but I‚Äôm 11 and I don‚Äôt have that kind of moneyüòÖ. So I think u should make a little more of this app free so people can partially use it with out paying.

title: Great app, but losing streaks is frustrating
review: I was fortunate to get a free year trial from my cardholder and have been enjoying the benefits. For some reason, the Calm app isn‚Äôt able to keep track of what time zone I‚Äôm in and I‚Äôve noticed that despite meditating at night sometimes, the app will register this as the next day even though the Daily Calm for the that day hasn‚Äôt been released yet. Would like this to be fixed!

title: Unreliable for long term
review: This app kept crashing and help directed me to uninstall and reinstall the app. It then worked fine for awhile until I accidentally deleted it. When I tried to reinstall it, I got a message that my device was not compatible!? That makes so sense since it was recently updated and working. I am not happy with this and will now consider uninstalling from other devices. I have not had these kinds of issues with other Apps.

title: Love it, just wish it was free
review: My only problem is it costs too much, and can‚Äôt unlock certain things. Seeing how lost my job due to covid that doesn‚Äôt completely help, but love how I still have access to other programs for the free aspect of the app. Other than that, very soothing and very helpful!

title: Sleep stories - options for longer play please!
review:
What I love: I use this app almost every night for the sleep stories, which are excellent and highly effective. Thank you SO much for providing such high quality scripts and voice talent. I also appreciate the variety of topics - and diversity of voices.

My issue: Most of the stories are around 30 minutes, which is long enough to put me to sleep. But then I often awaken when they end and have to manually restart or start a different one, which means more interrupted sleep.

My request: Please please please add either a playlist option or continuous play feature and/or more anthologies. 

Thank you üôèüíó

title: Great app! 4 stars so we can stay evolving!
review:
We need 2 additions!!

1: Please add a gratitude window at the end of the meditations in the ‚Äúcheck in with yourself‚Äù thank popup

2: A smile notification option to be able to remind you to smile more throughout the day

There is so many great features in this app and I love all the reminders to smile during meditation.

I love this app especially that it doesn‚Äôt ask how did that make you feel at the end of each meditation like a lot of other apps. we seem to have an inherent way of subconsciously feeling self judgment when question like that are asked. You guys even talked about that very topic right there on the app, too!

title: I love the app but...
review: I love the app before on my other phone before it broke. On that phone I had time in and many of my options were unlocked. But now that I logged in on my new phone everything is locked. üòüThe app helped me go to sleep EVERY night. Now I have to calm down other ways.

title: Stop moving‚Ä¶.
review: I love your app but please stop moving the music categories around.  If your using this as a test trials on us, please say so.  It‚Äôs so annoying to have to guess where to find the music I want. Of course, unless you provide a search function.   Either way, please help me find my music that is not yet in my favorites or off-line folders.

title: Best app to meditate
review: Calm is the best. I start each day with it and often end my days with it. I enjoy the meditation classes and the Daily Calm. I highly recommend it for anyone who desires peace, joy and calm in their lives. It's for everyone especially a bustling, hectic world. It has inspired me to pursue a Certification in meditation so I can teach it in my work.

title: Great! I‚Äôm a lifetime member!
review:
Totally worth it ! Just buy lifetime and use it everyday. 

Developers please fix the bug that the sound such as ocean or waves etc.  will often start playing in the background and continue forever until I close app.  Despite clicking stop.  It‚Äôll turn back on.

title: Extremely effective
review: Ever since I began using this app, daily meditation has drastically improved my mood and functionality, almost completely ridding me of my anxiety and frequent panic attacks. I would recommend this to absolutely everyone, even those who are already sound of mind.

title: Thank you Calm
review: I have been using this app for two or three years now but this year during the pandemic it has been exceptionally helpful. I would highly rated the music and daily meditations. I keep wanting to hear a bedtime story but never made the time but I‚Äôm sure that‚Äôs awesome too. Mark Agnello

title: Total relaxation
review: I work in healthcare. The stress of the day sometimes carries into  my sleep time and I find it impossible to relax. This app has made such a difference. Had no faith that it would help but figured I‚Äôd try it. I can‚Äôt believe how quickly it helped me find calmness. It‚Äôs truly magical. So glad I gave it a try.

title: Eh, it‚Äôs okay except...
review: When you lock your phone, the audio stops.  Really?  I‚Äôm trying to get some darn sleep and I have to leave the screen on?  I guess I‚Äôll just flip my phone on it‚Äôs face to eliminate the light.  Oh wait, even though the app is open and running, it doesn‚Äôt prevent my phone from automatically shutting the screen off and locking after 30 seconds.  But I‚Äôm SURE that feature is unlocked with the paid version.  Why even have a free version?  If this is your idea of advertising scheme, I‚Äôm not biting.

title: Great Tool
review: I find myself reaching for this instead of my usual vices most times when I am not sure what to do. There is something for most everything you are feeling and I always feel better after each session. The sleep meditations are wonderful as well.

title: Why I like ‚ÄúCalm‚Äù
review: I have had calm for quite awhile now. I had no idea that there were so many options you can choose from on this app. It is a mini self help for us to use at anytime any day that is convenient to me. That is priceless for me. The range of things you can use is the best.

title: Calm review
review: I am enjoying calm a lot. It it has sleep stories (even for kids). I has breathing and music. Everything is good except the breathing because they are too long. For our family sleep stories are just like sleeping related stories which we can watch at any time.

title: Love Calm! Even for the price
review: I only currently use calm for ambient noises to sleep. Specifically the soundscapes are excellent. Huge fan of ‚ÄúJasper Lake‚Äù and ‚ÄúCity Rain‚Äù. I hope one day I‚Äôll take advantage of more that calm has to offer. Despite my narrow uses I still thoroughly enjoy the product and the app. Highly recommend for ambient sleep noises.

title: I love This App
review: I only rated this app 4 stars because of Tamara Levitt‚Äôs voice. I‚Äôm really not trying to be mean, but her voice is maddening and distracting to me, and she is the only choice on so many of the guided meditations. My feelings on her voice obviously have zero to do with her person or being. I‚Äôm sure she‚Äôs a lovely human being, I just don‚Äôt want her voice guiding my meditations.

title: Glitchy at times.
review: I start a sleep story and two minutes in it stalls. Not every time but enough to be an anonymous.  The night does not change to the following day without clicking completely out of the app. All in all I am glad I have this resource.

title: There isn‚Äôt enough stars
review: I found this app when my anxiety and depression was so out of control I almost could not function. The emergency clam helped so much. It helped me enough to seek a mental health professional. Now I have an excellent therapist and meds that help regulate my brain chemistry. The sleep stories are my favorite.

title: Well-Blended
review: Part mental gymnasium, part classroom, part podcast, part bubbling brook & chirping swallow soundtrack, Calm is a well-blended mix of content designed to challenge, teach, and inspire us in the pursuit of balance. I wish the masterclass roster would expand a bit, that‚Äôs the only place I currently see lacking (and it‚Äôs not enough to subtract a star).

title: Cool app!
review: I like this app because it helps me with my ‚Äúanger issues‚Äù and it‚Äôs very relaxing. I try to follow along but my mind always wanders! I listen to Calm Kids (11-13) and I think that the narrators voice is perfect for the whole meditating mood. üòÇ At least it‚Äôs better than my scratchy voice lol. But yeah I recommend.

title: Enjoyment
review:
I am enjoying this app so much! My stress level has reduced dramatically after only one day/ imagine what a year could do! I only wish that I could afford that right now but I can't. As soon as I can though, I will happily pay $69! Thank for a taste of what I truly want in my life!
                          Jade Beetle

title: Calm works for me
review: I work a lot and even when I lie down for bed my mind still seems to be going. Calm relaxes my mind and thus relaxes my body. Now I can‚Äôt make it through a calm series completely because I‚Äôm sleep within the first few minutes. For me it‚Äôs a mental investment that‚Äôs so worth it.

title: Sleep Meditations
review: Loves the app initially. The sleep meditations are excellent. Those are why the app was recommended to me and why I recommended it to others. But unfortunately, the same sleep meditations are not as effective after listening to them over and over. Calm seems to have moved their focus elsewhere - lots of new other shiny toys, but just the same sleep meditations. Hoping they add new ones.

title: Mind-altering
review:
I‚Äôm not one to write reviews for apps, but Calm presents me daily with the opportunity to hone my focus, control my thoughts, and evolve into deeper ways of experiencing the present moment and world around me. 

I‚Äôve used the other apps, however, the variety and value contained in Calm is much greater for me. 

When I started out two months ago, I had a wild monkey mind. I still do on occasion and my practice isn‚Äôt always perfect. But with Calm‚Äôs guidance, I‚Äôm now sitting in 45-60 minute meditations with no problems.

I feel balanced, my extraneous thoughts are silenced, and I‚Äôm living a much more aware existence. I‚Äôm very grateful.

title: Keep Calm and Pay Up
review: I loved Calm. There was enough there that was free to keep me engaged with the app. Lately everything seems to be behind a paywall. I can change my scenes and hear different sounds but how long before those get put behind a paywall? It seems the only thing I can do now is the daily meditation. I understand that you all need to make money but come on! I would deal with listening to ads if it would open up more content. Perhaps you should consider that as an option.

title: Stories, the solution for my bedtime anxiety
review: I‚Äôm one of those people who gets anxious at bedtime. No matter how sleepy I am, my mind wanders and I end up tossing and turning for hours. White noise is no help for that, but the wonderful stories with soothing voices have worked like a charm...they work so well I have yet to hear the ending or one!

title: Really good app
review: i love this app it helps me focus on big days like before school or before a test or before I go to sleep it helps me in the best and worst of times. I wish I could unlock premium but it‚Äôs a little two expensive for me but there are still some awesome free sounds story‚Äôs and encouraging speeches.

title: Worth every penny
review: This app has changed my life in a positive way.  I also use it at night for my child because of its amazing selection of kids stories. So grateful for this app I am writing a review so that it can continue on the market and be a positive source of inspiration to others.

title: Good but less content than hoped
review:
I am paying for a subscription right now and I enjoy the app. My number one biggest problem is that Tamara Levitt narrates what feels like the majority of it and I feel bad saying this but I find her voice to be very irritating. So basically I avoid anything with her and she does *most* of the series :/ 

I hate myself for being this judgmental. Feels very unmindful but I just can‚Äôt help it.

title: Worth it
review: I‚Äôve never been a sound sleeper, but using this app really does make falling asleep much easier! I would LOVE if they could create a ‚Äúplay next‚Äù feature so if I‚Äôm not totally out by the time my story ends I don‚Äôt need to get up to select a new one or soundscape. Other than that I would suggest it to everyone wanting a little relaxation!

title: Anxiety
review: I started experiencing more anxiety from the stress of my job but then decided to start listening to this app every morning as I was starting my day and it helped me take away the worry & the negative thoughts, and just started to calm me each morning. Now this is part of my morning routine! Love this app!

title: It works.
review: I have really bad sleep problems. My mind does not stop thinking. Even though my body is exhausted. I was a sceptic about this app at first but I‚Äôm glad I gave it a chance. I fall asleep within minutes. Give it a try. You can always cancel if it‚Äôs not for you.

title: Don‚Äôt get if you don‚Äôt plan on getting premium
review: The app looks nice, but I wouldn‚Äôt know if I actually want to use it/sign up for a free trial if I can‚Äôt hear or see what‚Äôs on it. Absolutely everything in the app requires premium, you can sign up for a trial but it‚Äôs complicated and I want to see if it‚Äôs worth it to go through that trouble of signing up for a trial. Don‚Äôt get if you won‚Äôt subscribe for premium

title: Restless Sleep
review: I have been a restless sleeper for a long time.  Never really gave it any thought until I got older and started to do research on sleep.  I tried Calm and it works in putting me to sleep through out the night.  Love all the different sounds and I‚Äôm even learning how to meditate and focus.

title: Thank you...
review: I just got this app and I started on the 7 days of anxiety, it was only my first day but it really Helped put my mind at ease, thank you. Seriously. Thank you so much for making this app, it‚Äôs a literal life saver, I totally recommend this app to anyone that‚Äôs having anxiety or ADHD like myself, it really helps.

title: Tamara‚Äôs Voice
review: The app works well and has a lot of variety, probably more than I really need. Tamara‚Äôs voice, however, is grating and unpleasant, even for the 10 minute Daily Calm. I‚Äôm ASMR, and there is a limited selection (voices only, which is perfect for me) of ASMR in the Calm app, so I know that‚Äôs on the Calm developers‚Äô radar screen.  Maybe Tamara loves the sound of  her own voice, but please try to offer us users more options.

title: Not saying no free but where is it?!
review: I am not sure where any of the free things are in the app. Everything I pulled up said try it for free and then you subscribe. I understand things cannot all be free but I have found nothing that is. I was just looking to try to find some of the stuff to try before I bought anything but I cannot find anything except the water that turns on immediately upon opening the app. I‚Äôm sure it is nice but I don‚Äôt just pay for things like this without hearing things first.

title: Recommended
review: I love the sound editing. As soon as I open the app, I begin to calm down or start getting drowsy. I just started using it and can‚Äôt wait to go to bed. I subscribed to help my sleep but have found many other options that I intend to utilize such as meditation and others.

title: Life changer!
review: I downloaded this app during the first few weeks of the COVID pandemic and I can honestly say that I‚Äôve used it almost every day since then. If you‚Äôre looking for different ways to bring more peace into your life, I‚Äôd strongly recommend adding this to your daily routine.

title: CALM Hope During Uncertain Timed
review: One month into the COVID pandemic I was experiencing fast heart rate and highly negative thoughts. I downloaded the one year subscription and started a daily meditation practice. I started with 30 days learn to meditate and now listen to the Daily Calm ‚Äî everyday fir a year.  This really helped me with serenity. Thank you!

title: Voice choices
review:
I love the sleep stories and meditations, but I hate to say, Tamara Levits voice is not soothing or helpful when trying to sleep. Her voice is the female equivalent of Hannibal Lector. There are
Options for some meditations to select a narrator and I think this should be an option across the board. For the price you pay, I think it‚Äôs a reasonable request.

title: Loved The Velveteen Rabbit
review:
My mom used to read this book to me many a night and each time she read it she would burst into tears. As a little boy I would always ask her what was wrong, the poignancy of the story going over my head.

It is a beautiful story but it is sad. Well, it is happy and sad.

title: Daily Trip?
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for a few months and like it a lot. Went through the full ‚Äú30 days‚Äù series and have been doing a Daily Calm or a Daily Trip almost every day. But what happened to the Daily Trips? They seem to be missing today, including those that I had marked as favorites. :(

title: Trial and subscription
review: I got a 7day trial and then wouldn‚Äôt start unless I selected a subscription, then needs a subscription for most of content because it says it is free. However even if u get a year worth it is cents to a day. I can also tell it relaxes me because I listened to the sleep stories and slept for 12 hours every night.

title: Charged me for a year up front
review: I signed up for a trial, didn't work. Forgot about it. A week later i get a notification i got charged 80 for access to premium (whatever that means) for a year. Why would anyone buy a yearly subscription after a free trial? They automatically set for a year even though a monthly subscription is available. My account is over drawn. *u*k this app i want my money back if you're truly an insomniac it does not work and their automatic payment settings are predatory.

title: So Amazing!!!!!
review: This app has helped me calm down and realize amazing things. When you fill out the ‚ÄúHow are you feeling‚Äù, it gives you audios and quotes to help you with a strong emotions if needed. I would recommend this app VERY MUCH!!! Oh and you can listen to nature like fire, rain, thunderstorms, white noise and more!

title: A go-to
review: Not only do I use this in my house doe me and my kids, as a teacher, this runs in my classrooms and really accesses the kids, especially this year. Both my children and my students ask for it and are noticeably calmer minutes into the music or soundscape or story. Love this thing.

title: Not So good
review: I downloaded the app because I was having trouble sleeping and after creating my account (which was quick and easy) I couldn‚Äôt find one song, nature soundscape, or anything for free! I understand they need to make money somehow but I would like to have some free options! However when you are on the app it plays some nature sounds which is quite pleasant you can also customize what nature sound you like.

title: Worth it
review: It helps me sleep, it helps me calm down during travel, it has a variety of soundscapes. Some you may have never thought was an option and there's also visuals that go with the sound as well. I want to invest in the lifetime option

title: Great but one problem
review: I love Calm it gives me a reason to look forward to going to bed when my Mom tells me to. But one thing is I wish more meditation options if you don‚Äôt have the premium set. But other wise it‚Äôs amazing and I think you should get it toüòÅ

title: Should be called ‚ÄúThe Tamara App‚Äù
review: At first this app seems to have a lot to offer; then you realize almost every meditation is guided by Tamara. That‚Äôd be great if I just loved Tamara, but I don‚Äôt. I liked a few at first, but I find myself so irritated that she is my only option that now I can‚Äôt enjoy anything she guides. I do love the soundscapes and nature melodies. Going to give it another week to see if I find anything that makes it worth keeping. But for now, I‚Äôm leaning towards canceling.

title: Grateful!
review: Thank you for the work you are doing! I look forward each day to a beautiful mediation, and my life ( and in turn the lives of others, I hope) are getting better. The sleep stories and other trainings are wonderful too. Thank you.

title: Amazing App
review: This app has been amazing to use, not only because of the stunning visuals but because it is super user friendly. It also has a variety of meditation exercises, music, courses and other activities to help you relax and improve your well-being.

title: Missing quick access to favorites
review: I love this app and use it constantly- at work, to go to sleep, on my commute.  I really wish there was a simple button on the Home Screen to get me to a list of my favorites. It takes too long to find them, especially in the middle of the night.

title: Timer
review: Love this app so far! Wondering if there‚Äôs a way to set an automatic start timer for the sleep music. I have a specific need for this. I know you can set a timer to turn it off, so wondering if this feature can be added, or if there‚Äôs a workaround for the iPhone?

title: Great but needs more voices
review: Love this app! My only negative thing to say is I wish they offered more meditations that did not have Tamara as the voice. There‚Äôs just something about her voice that does not allow me to fully relax so it‚Äôs harder to find other people leading meditations. Other than that great app and has really helped my mental health!

title: Simple and awesome
review: I love this app.  It‚Äôs easy to use and the variety is awesome.   I practice daily so the variety is refreshing.  It opens my mind to new and exciting avenues of mind calming.  The daily background music is life changing for me.  It settles my anxiety and blood pressure instantly.   Thank you Calm.  Keep up the good work ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è five stars!

title: Amazing! Works like magic!
review: I can finally get a good night‚Äôs sleep now! Calm‚Äôs Sleep Stories work like magic (my favorite is A Rainy Day in Paris), and using that plus one of their meditations in the morning really helps me maintain a calm and productive state of mind. I don‚Äôt know what I would do without this app! Thank you Calm! :)

title: Calming but Crashing
review: The Calm app has the ability to be incredible but the app crashes daily, especially with anything selected involving sleep. The app will crash over and over again until you delete and reinstall. Then the following day it does the same thing. I strongly suggest you use another app until they fix their bugs. There is nothing calming by the frustration of trying to meditate or sleep.

title: Content now missing
review: I had the app on my phone for so long that I had a lot of different soundscapes from when they were free. Now that the app has updated I had to delete and reinstall because it kept crashing trying to start, and now all my favorite soundscapes are gone and there are only like three free ones for me to have on while I sleep. I would literally pay a one time fee if there did an app that was just background noise, I don‚Äôt need bedtime stories or meditation.

title: I love this app!
review: I was very iffy about trying this app. My therapist and psychiatrist recommended it. I have absolute no patience at times and it‚Äôs hard to bring my anger down. The breathing techniques and positive vibes it gives. It actually helps me calm down. It makes me happy. Give it a try! You won‚Äôt regret it. ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Sleepiness takes over really quicküí§
review: I got the app because the month we have been selling your house has been super stressful and I wake up with my mind racing. I love love love the different options on this app to help get back to sleep. It helps having wireless earbuds.

title: Calm
review: I started using the Calm app almost a year ago. I was feeling very anxious & stressed because of the pandemic as well as dealing with a negative experience in my life. I am so grateful to have found this app. It has helped me through guided meditations to heal myself with loving kindness. I highly recommend this app.

title: ‚ÄúCalm..download the free app now‚Äù
review: I used to be an avid Calm app user a couple years ago and there was so much more free content and mediations compared to now. I came back to it to try and improve my sleep and was frustrated to find all my favorite meditations are no longer available unless I pay for a subscription. Very misleading advertisement I have been hearing go around too about downloading the free app. Yeah it‚Äôs free to download but that is about it.

title: More variety in meditation in voices needed
review: I bought this cause I saw LeBron had a series, but was looking for mainstream meditation take up the bulk of what I listen to. I cannot stand the voice of the woman who does most of the meditation guidance however. I realize it‚Äôs highly subjective, but they should still have more variety. Headspace offers 2-3 different voices for popular lessons, and there‚Äôs enough vocal variety there to have plenty to choose from.

title: I love this app!
review: I‚Äôm not one for buying subscriptions but this app brings me peace. From the meditations to the sleep stories. However I find myself listening to the music more than anything. Several gems are in this app including string version of Exhale by Sabrina Carpenter, Lo-Fi beats, and the most awesome Dreams playlist by Priscilla Ahn.

title: My subscription
review: I had only wanted to do the 7 day free trial and I get a $76 charge from my bank account today. I canceled the unwanted subscription, but I will still be able to access the app for an entire year. I‚Äôd much rather have my money back. Please and Thank You. The app is great but I am in no shape to have $76 taken out of my account right now. Especially if I am not using the app everyday. If I could please have my money back. Thanks.

title: So far so good
review: I hope they keep expanding on the content. I have really, really bad sleep anxiety, paralysis and deal with psychosis when stressed or depressed. It‚Äôs been helpful to use Calm daily and it‚Äôs helped a good chunk of my symptoms. It‚Äôs a big deal. I was sleeping only 1-3hrs a night. I‚Äôm up to 5-6 which was great for me.

title: Best app ever ü§©üòª
review: This is a great app and is definitely worth the money. It has so many great sleep stories and daily check ins too! I have this app since it ever came out and I can tell you that it only gets better! You have to get this and you should believe me!üíô

title: Love the sleep stories
review: I only use this app for sleep stories so I can‚Äôt comment on any other content. But what‚Äôs not to love about falling asleep to the sound of Bob Ross, Scottie Pippen, John McEnroe, Matthew McConaughey and many more? I use it every night and I am very happy I was able to purchase a lifetime membership on sale.

title: Everyday new learning
review: Calm app 10 minutes meditation every day morning something new learning, this will help everyone being mindful during the day and automatically build the skill to become stronger, stress free, not being emotional and many more benefits!

title: well...
review:
here‚Äôs my opinion:
when i saw the ad for this app and sounded like it was legit so i downloaded to try it out. But to my surprise  literally everything costs money and it‚Äôs SEVENTY DOLLARS for one year which i think is a little insane but i just wanted to y‚Äôall that this app is not really that worth it just saying (disclaimer: i think there‚Äôs like 4 things that are free but only 4 and everything else just costs money which i think is a rip off)

title: Took away key features
review: I noticed this awhile ago, but I miss setting the breathing exercises that you want to do, not only the ones they have programmed. I also noticed that they did away with the weekly goals which is a bummer because it gave me accountability. Still a good app to use, but if they're not broken, why fix some of the positive features?

title: Great for kids
review: This app paid for itself in the sleep stories that help calm my kids before bed. We also read to the kids but to help them sleep they have loved the sleep stories. When someone is upset before bed this is our go to!!!!!

title: DAY 2!!!!
review: Really helps guys. I thought I was going to have to go to the doctor. My first day started on Sunday and I was the most productive I ever was at work today. I‚Äôm from the Houston Tx area. I promise it‚Äôs worth the meditations. Do your mood check ins and compare!! I will be using as often as possible.

title: Not Worth the Exorbitant Cost
review:
The voices/narrators used are not soothing at all. That was a surprise given the seemingly high production quality. It does not feel chill, for lack of a better term; rather, it feels like you're in a university lecture. Not good. 

Additionally, I simply don't find the content helpful. There are free resources that helped me better. 

I'm a healthcare worker who downloaded this to help w acute stress. I can't recommend this at all to anyone going through any kind of real stress. It's just weak tea that doesn't even sound good.

title: The best!!
review: The app has helped not only my but my kids during this difficult times. When we all went on quarantine the anxiety level was through the roof in my house. And between the meditations, story night and evening wine downs, we learn to calm ourselves down

title: Wow
review: It actually works . I love this so much. It seems expensive. But if you have insomnia like me ....it beats taking sleeping aids that make you feel like crap each day. I was enjoying the stories like my mind is clear and picturing what they say . Al I remember was the beginning like wow I love this story then I fell asleep.

title: Slim selection of content
review: I got the annual subscription and regretted it the first months. Over 70% of the content is by Tamara Levitt, so if you do not like her style of meditation then you are out of luck. It is essentially the Tamara Levitt meditation app. With a handful of guest stars. I would look elsewhere. Waste of money.

title: Not worth the cost
review: I was pretty disappointed by the limited somatic practices and rather narrow and repetitive daily prompts. I feel like this app tries to provide too many services and stretches itself thin, which compromises the quality that can be achieved. There are some really nice functions in this, but overall I feel I only am interested in 30% of what the app offers and the quality of that 30% isn‚Äôt worth the cost

title: Transforms
review:
The Calm App has transformed myself and my world. The wide array of mediations and sound scapes allows me to stick with doing the mediation and being able to truly relax and feel
